title: Only two wheels
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Terry Jennings and Ron Saunders
brief_description: Emphasizing the importance of motor cycle riders seeing and being seen, this film highlights a variety of problems that normally confront the motor cyclist - lane changing, hazards on the road, car blind spots, careless pedestrians and emergency braking.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation, Terry Jennings and Ron Saunders
